schema.description: 专有宿主机所属的地域ID。您可以调用[DescribeRegions](~~25609~~)查看最新的阿里云地域列表。

400.errorMessage: The operation is not permitted due to charge type of the dedicated host.
The specified ddh status does not support this operation.

403.errorMessage: Instance exists on the dedicated host.
The specified ddh is shared to other users. Remove it from the resource share before releasing.

404.errorMessage: The specified DedicatedHostId does not exist.

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

title: 释放专有宿主机
summary: 调用ReleaseDedicatedHost释放一台按量付费专有宿主机。
description: 释放按量付费专有宿主机之前，请确保该宿主机上不存在任何ECS实例。
